page.title: 06SCHOOL TIMETABLE FOR A DAY
page.content:
NEWPORT FREE GRAMMAR SCHOOL -TUESDAY
A{typical}timetable for an average 14 year old boy. {TIME.} {LESSON.} _____ _______ PERIOD 1 9.25-10.00 Physics PERIOD 2 10.00-10.35 Physics { break} {10.35-10.50} PERIOD 3 10.50-11.25 English PERIOD 4 11.25-12.00 Maths { lunch 12.00-13.10} PERIOD 5 13.15-13.50 German PERIOD 6 13.50-14.25 Maths { break 14.25-14.30 PERIOD 7 14.30-15.05 Art PERIOD 8 15.05-15.40 Art Other subjects in the week; Geography, French, Chemistry, Biology, R.E., C.D.T.,P.E.,History,Drama,Music, Life and Study Skills.
